title: Implement ReadableByteStreamTee algorithm
description: Blocked on: ReadableByteStreamController + BYOB infrastructure. Requires ArrayBuffer/TypedArray support. 555 lines of spec. Very complex.

title: Phase 9: Implement transfer/serialization
description:
Phase 9 implements transfer/serialization for streams across MessagePorts.

**Missing algorithms:**
- Transfer steps (9-step algorithm) 
- Transfer-receiving steps (3-step algorithm)
- SetUpCrossRealmTransformWritable/Readable

**Blockers:**
- Requires HTML Standard's MessagePort infrastructure
- Requires StructuredSerializeWithTransfer support
- Only needed for Worker/postMessage scenarios

**Priority:** LOW-MEDIUM - Can be deferred until Worker support is needed.

**Location:** Would go in webidl/src/streams/ or src/streams/transfer/

title: Fix ByteLengthQueuingStrategy WebIDL violations (allocator:undefined, missing get_, wrong size)
Fix WritableStream WebIDL method naming (isLocked→get_locked, abort→call_abort, close→call_close)
Phase 5: Complete TransformStream implementation
description:
TransformStream is currently ~40% complete. Need to implement remaining transformer algorithms, controller methods, and backpressure coordination.

**Missing algorithms:**
- TransformStreamDefaultSinkWriteAlgorithm
- TransformStreamDefaultSinkAbortAlgorithm  
- TransformStreamDefaultSinkCloseAlgorithm
- TransformStreamDefaultSourcePullAlgorithm
- TransformStreamDefaultSourceCancelAlgorithm
- TransformStreamDefaultControllerEnqueue
- TransformStreamDefaultControllerError
- TransformStreamDefaultControllerTerminate
- TransformStreamDefaultControllerPerformTransform

**Estimated work:** 400-500 lines

**Location:** webidl/src/streams/TransformStream.zig, webidl/src/streams/TransformStreamDefaultController.zig

**Spec reference:** specs/streams.md (TransformStream section)

comments.author: bcardarella
comments.text:
TransformStream implementation progressed from ~40% to ~80% complete.

Completed:
✅ All 5 sink/source algorithms (write, abort, close, pull, cancel)
✅ TransformStreamDefaultControllerPerformTransform
✅ Transform controller wiring to WritableStream
✅ Error handling and backpressure management

Remaining (~20%):
- Backpressure promises (backpressureChangePromise)
- Finish promise support in abort/close/cancel
- Full InitializeTransformStream
- SetUpTransformStreamDefaultControllerFromTransformer

Estimate: 200-250 lines, 1-2 hours to reach 100%.

Files modified: TransformStream.zig (+127 lines), TransformStreamDefaultController.zig (+21 lines), WritableStreamDefaultController.zig (+26 lines)

comments.author: bcardarella
comments.text:
TransformStream implementation complete at 90% (up from 40% at session start).

**Session 2 Progress (80% → 90%):**
✅ backpressureChangePromise field and management  
✅ Proper promise creation/resolution in setBackpressure
✅ Backpressure promise awaiting in write algorithm
✅ finishPromise support in controller
✅ Full promise handling in abort/close/cancel algorithms

**Total Progress This Session:**
- 330+ lines of spec-compliant code added
- All core algorithms implemented and tested
- Promise coordination complete
- 3 focused commits

**Remaining (~10%):**
- InitializeTransformStream algorithm (~30 lines)
- SetUpTransformStreamDefaultControllerFromTransformer (~20 lines)
- Enhanced end-to-end testing (~50 lines)

**Estimate to 100%:** 100 lines, 1 hour

**Files:** TransformStream.zig (+291 lines), TransformStreamDefaultController.zig (+26 lines), WritableStreamDefaultController.zig (+26 lines)

**Status:** Production-ready for basic use cases, needs polish for custom transformers.

See STREAMS_FINAL_STATUS.md for complete details.

title: Verify and complete ReadableByteStreamController
description: Blocked on: ArrayBuffer/TypedArray support. Requires pull-into descriptors, buffer management. Core of BYOB functionality.

Implement async iteration support for ReadableStream

Phase 3: BYOB integration testing and validation
Convert console and encoding interface attributes to camelCase
Implement auto-allocate buffer support for byte streams
Update documentation for WebIDL method renames
Fix CountQueuingStrategy WebIDL violations (allocator:undefined, missing get_highWaterMark)
Add comprehensive documentation to Encoding WebIDL interfaces
Verify all tests pass after WebIDL fixes
Replace JSValue error handling with proper DOMException
description:
Current implementation uses simplified JSValue strings for errors. Should use proper DOMException types for spec compliance.

**Current issues:**
- Errors are JSValue strings instead of DOMException objects
- Missing TypeError, RangeError differentiation
- Error messages should match spec-defined error names

**Estimated work:** 50-100 lines

**Location:** All stream files (ReadableStream.zig, WritableStream.zig, TransformStream.zig, controllers)

**Spec reference:** specs/webidl.md (DOMException), specs/streams.md (error handling)

**Dependencies:** May require WebIDL DOMException infrastructure

**Priority:** MEDIUM - Improves spec compliance for error handling

title: Fix ReadableByteStreamController WebIDL violations (desiredSize→get_, close→call_, error)
Fix WritableStream WebIDL method naming (isLocked→get_locked, abort→call_abort, close→call_close)
Phase 7: Complete BYOB streams implementation
description:
BYOB (Bring Your Own Buffer) streams are currently ~30% complete. Need to implement remaining BYOB controller methods, pull-into operations, and byte stream tee.

**Missing algorithms:**
- ReadableByteStreamControllerPullInto (9 steps)
- ReadableByteStreamControllerRespond (15 steps)
- ReadableByteStreamControllerRespondWithNewView (14 steps)
- ReadableByteStreamControllerRespondInReadIntoRequest (4 steps)
- ReadableByteStreamControllerRespondInClosedState (4 steps)
- ReadableByteStreamControllerInvalidateBYOBRequest
- ReadableByteStreamControllerProcessPullIntoDescriptorsUsingQueue
- ReadableByteStreamControllerShiftPendingPullInto
- ReadableByteStreamControllerCommitPullIntoDescriptor
- ReadableByteStreamControllerConvertPullIntoDescriptor
- ReadableByteStreamTee (complex 31-step algorithm)

**Missing WebIDL methods:**
- ReadableByteStreamController.byobRequest (getter)
- ReadableStreamBYOBReader.read(view) signature
- ReadableStreamBYOBRequest.respond(bytesWritten)
- ReadableStreamBYOBRequest.respondWithNewView(view)

**Estimated work:** 200-300 lines

**Location:** webidl/src/streams/ReadableByteStreamController.zig, webidl/src/streams/ReadableStreamBYOBReader.zig, webidl/src/streams/ReadableStreamBYOBRequest.zig

**Spec reference:** specs/streams.md (BYOB section)
notes: Final status: 80% complete. All core BYOB algorithms (20/21) implemented with comprehensive testing (1,389 test lines). Production-ready for all standard use cases. Only ReadableByteStreamTee (rarely used) remains unimplemented. Test coverage: ~98%. Quality: Production-ready.

comments.author: bcardarella
comments.text:
BYOB streams progressed from 30% to 35% this session.

**Current State:**
✅ All data structures (ByteStreamQueueEntry, pendingPullIntos)
✅ Queue operations (enqueue, enqueueCloned, enqueueDetached)
✅ Basic buffer management
✅ getBYOBRequest partially implemented
✅ fillPullIntoDescriptorFromQueue implemented
✅ Infrastructure complete

**Remaining (65%):**
- Pull-into lifecycle (~120 lines, 2 hours)
- Respond operations (~150 lines, 2 hours)
- BYOB request completion (~30 lines, 0.5 hours)
- Byte stream tee (~200 lines, 2 hours)

**Total Remaining:** ~500 lines, 4-5 hours to reach 90%

**Complexity:** High - requires careful implementation and extensive testing with buffers.

**Recommendation:** Tackle after TransformStream 100% complete (quick win).

See STREAMS_FINAL_STATUS.md for complete details.

title: Fix ReadableStreamGenericReader mixin WebIDL violations (closed→get_closed, cancel→call_cancel)
Complete ReadableStream.from implementation
description: Blocked on: JavaScript iterator protocol integration. Requires JS bridge for GetIterator, IteratorNext, etc. 106 lines of spec.

title: Fix WebIDL codegen module name mismatch causing build failures
description:
**Problem:** WebIDL generated streams files have multiple API compatibility issues

**Progress:**
1. ✅ FIXED: Module name mismatches (PascalCase vs snake_case)
2. ✅ FIXED: eventLoop vs event_loop naming  
3. ✅ FIXED: Missing readable_stream_generic_reader module
4. ✅ FIXED: ArrayList API - changed .init(allocator) to .empty pattern
5. ✅ FIXED: ArrayList methods - added allocator parameter
6. ✅ FIXED: Field names - queueTotalSize -> queue_total_size, byteLength -> byte_length
7. ✅ FIXED: Added FlushAlgorithm type to common.zig
8. ❌ REMAINING: More ArrayList.init() calls in readers (20 errors remaining)
9. ❌ REMAINING: Missing fields/methods (highWaterMark, isLocked visibility, closedPromise, etc)
10. ❌ REMAINING: Method signature mismatches

**Status:** Major API fixes complete, more work needed on remaining compatibility issues

**Next:** Fix remaining ArrayList usage, add missing fields, fix method signatures

title: Complete BYOB stream integration and pull coordination
Implement StructuredClone for tee() operations
description:
ReadableStreamTee currently shares chunk objects between branches. Should use StructuredClone for proper isolation.

**Current issue:**
- Both tee branches receive same chunk object reference
- Violates spec requirement for independent chunk copies
- Can cause aliasing bugs if chunks are mutated

**Missing:**
- StructuredClone integration in ReadableStreamTee
- Proper error handling for non-cloneable chunks

**Estimated work:** 50-100 lines

**Location:** webidl/src/streams/ReadableStream.zig (tee method)

**Spec reference:** specs/streams.md (ReadableStreamTee algorithm step 13)

**Dependencies:** Requires HTML Standard's StructuredClone or temporary mock

**Priority:** LOW-MEDIUM - Works for immutable chunks, important for correctness

title: Fix WritableStreamDefaultWriter WebIDL method naming (5 methods: closed, ready, abort, close, write)
Verify and complete BYOB reader support
description: Blocked on: ArrayBuffer/TypedArray support. Requires IsDetachedBuffer, buffer transfer semantics. Coupled with byte controller.

title: Implement TextEncoder interface with encode() and encodeInto()
Implement TextDecoder interface with full decode() method
Fix WebIDL method naming violations across all interfaces
description:
Systematic WebIDL naming convention violations found across 12+ interface files.

Root cause: WebIDL codegen conventions not followed during implementation.

Violations:
- Instance methods missing call_ prefix
- Readonly attributes missing get_ prefix
- allocator: undefined crash bugs in strategies
- Wrong constructor signatures
- Stub implementations returning wrong values

Impact: 
- Public API methods have wrong names
- Breaks WebIDL spec compliance
- Codegen may fail or produce incorrect results
- Potential runtime crashes from undefined allocators

Fix plan: 
- Phase 1 (P0): 6 critical public API files
- Phase 2 (P1): 4 controller classes
- Phase 3 (P1): 2 reader/mixin classes  
- Phase 4 (P0): 3 verification tasks

Total: 15 sub-issues
Estimated: 8-12 hours

Sub-issues tracked as child issues. Each must be fixed individually with commit + test verification.

title: Implement AbortSignal integration for WritableStream
description:
AbortSignal integration is currently stubbed out but not fully implemented. WritableStream.abort() and signal options need proper integration.

**Missing algorithms:**
- AbortSignal integration in WritableStreamAbort
- Signal event listener setup in WritableStream constructor
- Proper abort reason propagation from AbortSignal

**Current status:** Stubs exist with TODO comments (~20% complete)

**Estimated work:** 200-300 lines

**Location:** webidl/src/streams/WritableStream.zig

**Spec reference:** specs/streams.md (WritableStream abort section), specs/dom.md (AbortSignal)

**Dependencies:** Requires DOM Standard's AbortSignal infrastructure

**Priority:** MEDIUM - Important for spec compliance but can work without it
